Annotate Mutations By HGVSg

dot-annotate_mutations_by_hgvsg.Rd

Annotate Mutations By HGVSg

Usage

.annotate_mutations_by_hgvsg(mutations, annotate_tumor_type)

Arguments

mutations

Value

a dataframe of annotated mutations

Examples



mutations <- rename_columns(oncokbR::mutations_hgvsg)
mutations$index = 1:nrow(mutations)
.annotate_mutations_by_hgvsg(mutations, annotate_tumor_type = FALSE)
#> # A tibble: 14 × 7
#>    title        status detail                      path  message sample_id index
